ygData.subject: Hand to hand?????
ygData.msgSnippet: There are many times, I simply hate to abandon my instrument and equip my heavy weapon. I would love to continue pounding my drum and punch my enemy in
ygData.messageBody:
There are many times, I simply hate to abandon my instrument and
equip my heavy weapon. I would love to continue pounding my drum and
punch my enemy in synchrony with the beat of my tune. However so far,
my delicate hands yield very little damage, unless holding a weapon.
I was wondering if any fellow bard has an excellent hand to hand
skill. Is it worth practicing? What is the most damage that can be
inflicted with ones bare bard hands?
Visha of Karana
